title: Billionaire Femi Otedola celebrates his only son, Fewa as he clocks a new year today
content: CEO of Forte Oil, Femi Otedola, is blessed with four children, three daughters and a son.    While his second daughter, DJ Cuppy and third daughter, Temi Otedola who is a fashion blogger, are well known in the media, his first daughter, Olawumi, and his only son, and last child, Fewa keep things private.    Fewa turns a year older today and the oil magnate has taken to social media to celebrate his heir…       Sharing the photo above , Femi Otedola wrote:  “Happy Birthday to my dear son, i love you Fewa.”   See more photos of Fewa below:         Leave a Comment…   comments    The post Billionaire Femi Otedola celebrates his only son, Fewa as he clocks a new year today appeared first on INFORMATION NIGERIA .
contentWithMarkup:
CEO of Forte Oil, Femi Otedola, is blessed with four children, three daughters and a son.

While his second daughter, DJ Cuppy and third daughter, Temi Otedola who is a fashion blogger, are well known in the media, his first daughter, Olawumi, and his only son, and last child, Fewa keep things private.

Fewa turns a year older today and the oil magnate has taken to social media to celebrate his heir…

Sharing the photo above , Femi Otedola wrote: “Happy Birthday to my dear son, i love you Fewa.”
